name: Chill.
description:
Relax with friends or by yourself on a beach paradise. 

Notes:

If you want to host you must have port 7777 open.
Change settings by clicking the gear in the top right of the main and in-game menus.
You can change the music and controls in the settings menu.

You can enter VR mode by selecting the Toggle XR button from the settings menu.

Normal Controls:

WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
Space - Jump
Shift - Sprint
Left Click & Hold - Grab
Right Click & Hold - Rotate Object
Scroll Wheel (while grabbing) - Move Object closer or further away
Escape - In-game Menu

VR Controls:

Grip to Pick Up Objects

Smooth Movement Mode:
Left Stick - Move
Left Trigger - Teleport

Teleport Mode:
Left Stick Forward - Teleport
Left Trigger - Teleport
